tabs.title: Rules
tabs.text: Find the code in -N- attempts or less to claim the title of Mastermind.

tabs.title: How to Play
text: Click on a color to place a bead of that color in your solution, beads are placed in the order in which you pick them.
Click on 'clear' to clear your solution.
Click on 'submit' once you are satisfied with your solution to submit it.
